docstring.long_description:
If a Scalar input is provided, the Scalar is returned with the timestamp as an OrderedPair.

Inputs
------
default : Scalar
    A value to timestamp
docstring.short_description: Return the current UNIX timestamp as a float (Scalar) or array (Vector) with length equal to 1.

parameters.name: dc_type
parameters.description: The type of DataContainer to return.
